job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field

jd: From: Shivam, vkoresolutions shivam@vkoresolutions.com Reply to: shivam@vkoresolutions.com Hi Folks, Hope you are doing well . We have urgent requirement of Dot Net Developer local to Aurora Colorado . Job Title: Dot Net DeveloperLocation: Aurora Colorado ( Need locals or Nearby ) Experience: 8+ Years ( for W2 )Key Responsibilities:Develop and maintain applications using .NET (C#, ASP.NET).Collaborate with team members to understand project needs.Write clean and efficient code.Troubleshoot and fix software issues.Optimize applications for better performance.Stay updated on new technologies.Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field.Experience with .NET (C#, ASP.NET).Basic knowledge of front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).Familiarity with databases (SQL Server, MySQL).Good problem-solving skills.Strong communication and teamwork skills.Thanks,Shivam Sharma Vkoresolutions LLCshivam@vkoresolutions.com
